SELECT id,code,title,read_number,top_num,create_by,create_date, left(content,50) content,del_flag from blog_article
and title like concat(concat('%',#{title}),'%') and content like concat(concat('%',#{content}),'%')
order by read_number asc,create_date desc
mapper.sql: ba.id,ba.code,ba.title,ba.read_number readNumber, ba.top_num topNum,ba.create_by createBy,ba.create_date createDate, left(ba.content,50) content, su.username createName,ba.first_img firstImg
mapper.select:
select
from blog_article ba LEFT JOIN sys_user su on ba.create_by=su.id where ba.del_flag=0 order by ba.top_num desc,ba.create_date desc

select
from blog_article ba left JOIN blog_article_category bac on ba.id=bac.article_id LEFT JOIN blog_category bc on bac.category_id=bc.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su on ba.create_by=su.id where ba.del_flag=0
and bc.code=#{code}
order by ba.top_num desc,ba.create_date desc

select
from blog_article ba LEFT JOIN blog_article_tag bat on ba.id=bat.article_id LEFT JOIN blog_tag bt on bat.tag_id=bt.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su on ba.create_by=su.id where bt.tag_code=#{tagCode} and ba.del_flag=0 order by ba.top_num desc,ba.create_date desc

select id,code,title,read_number,top_num,create_by,create_date, left(content,50) content from blog_article where del_flag=0
and unix_timestamp(create_date) > unix_timestamp(#{createDate})
order by create_date asc
